table:columns.name: coastal_grid:id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for each tile, derived from bounds and a deterministic hex suffix.

table:columns.name: coastal_grid:quadkey
table:columns.description: Mercator quadkey for each tile, indicating its spatial location and zoom level.

table:columns.name: coastal_grid:utm_epsg
table:columns.description: EPSG code for the UTM zone of the tile estimated by GeoPandas.estimate_utm_crs().

table:columns.name: admin:countries
table:columns.description: JSON list of countries intersecting the tile (e.g., '["CA", "US"]').

table:columns.name: admin:continents
table:columns.description: JSON list of continents intersecting the tile (e.g., '["NA", "SA"]').

table:columns.name: s2:mgrs_tile
table:columns.description: JSON list of Sentinel-2 MGRS tiles intersecting the tile (e.g., '["15XWL", "16XDR"]').

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Polygon geometry defining the spatial extent of the tile.

data.title: Coastal Grid
data.description: Parquet dataset providing a global structured coastal grid for coastal analytics

table:columns.name: coastal_grid:id
table:columns.description: Unique identifier for each tile, derived from bounds and a deterministic hex suffix.

table:columns.name: coastal_grid:quadkey
table:columns.description: Mercator quadkey for each tile, indicating its spatial location and zoom level.

table:columns.name: coastal_grid:bbox
table:columns.description: Bounding box of the tile in WGS84 coordinates, represented as a dictionary.

table:columns.name: coastal_grid:utm_epsg
table:columns.description: EPSG code for the UTM zone of the tile estimated by GeoPandas.estimate_utm_crs().

table:columns.name: admin:countries
table:columns.description: JSON list of countries intersecting the tile (e.g., '["CA", "US"]').

table:columns.name: admin:continents
table:columns.description: JSON list of continents intersecting the tile (e.g., '["NA", "SA"]').

table:columns.name: s2:mgrs_tile
table:columns.description: JSON list of Sentinel-2 MGRS tiles intersecting the tile (e.g., '["15XWL", "16XDR"]').

table:columns.name: geometry
table:columns.description: Polygon geometry defining the spatial extent of the tile.
